Sense | Senior Product Manager | Boston / Cambridge, MA | Full-time | ONSITE | https://sense.com

We build Sense, the home energy monitor that uses advanced DSP & distributed machine learning to detect and track the energy use of devices in your home.

Sense is looking for an experienced product manager to lead the discovery, design, and launch of new products that serve companies who deploy Sense at scale, like solar installers, electric utilities, energy efficiency companies, and more. We will depend on you to research and understand these markets, discover and design solutions, and lead cross-functional teams to design, build, launch, and iterate on new products.

We also have openings in * Data Science * Marketing * Engineering

https://sense.com/careers.html
